channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: South African farm worker says he was forced to feed women to pigs
Tesla approves share award worth $29 billion to CEO Elon Musk
Trump Media CEO Nunes loses defamation lawsuit over Rachel Maddow show
Think you’re allergic to penicillin? Pharmacist explains why there’s a good chance you’re not
Fmr. Commerce Sec. Wilbur Ross explains Trump's BLS suspicions
Are political power grabs through redistricting becoming the new normal?
item.description: With Texas lawmakers in a standoff over redrawing district lines, and other states following suit, CBS News legal contributor Jessica Levinson unpacks...

item.title: Trump envoy Witkoff to head to Russia for 'last chance' Ukraine ceasefire talks
item.description: President Donald Trump's special envoy Steve Witkoff is expected to travel to Russia later this week, the president told reporters on Sunday.

item.title: Tesla grants CEO Elon Musk $29 billion pay package
item.description: The new package comes just six months after a judge ordered the company to revoke his $56 billion pay package.

item.title: Texas governor threatens to remove Democrats who left state over Trump-backed redistricting
WATCH: Rescued sea turtle returned to ocean after treatment
item.description: Pennywise, a large sea turtle that was found injured along the Florida coast in May following a boat strike, has been returned to the ocean.
